body:
Hey everyone, I haven't done one of these for quite some time (a few months), so I've decided to continue making them!
I'm trying to do some more editing for my montages, so let me know what you think. Constructive criticism is always appreciated!

Anyways, here is the video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tD7rp3s6pbk

Enjoy everyone, have a great day! :)

replies.body:
It might be a good idea to make a thread like Qfrog did where you can post all your videos in one thread as opposed to scatteredd about the fourms. It makes the forums slightly less cluttered and you seem more organised with all your videos to be found the same place.

 Like the videos though keep it up!
